lines.string: I perceive in your eyes the need to go explore the Dungeons.
But the hard truth is this.
You are the only hope we have left.
It is dangerous to go alone, but you must trust yourself.
I will be waiting for you. Now, you must go.
Remember not to be defeated if you still want to keep your soul pure.
Your soul is your life force, it determines who you are and where you go.
The only safe place is the Valley.
You have just condemned yourself to something worse than death.
Too many brave souls have risked their lives exploring the Dungeons.
We lost everything we had achieved.
When your soul is hunted, you can not hide forever.
The world had never seen anything like this. We were not even prepared for it.
